page.title: Assignments
page.subtitle: Manage service and staff assignments by location

emptyState.noLocationsAvailableDescription: Create locations first to manage service and staff assignments.
emptyState.selectLocationTitle: Select a location to get started
emptyState.selectLocationDescription: Choose a location from the list to manage which services are available and configure team member assignments.

teamMemberOverridesModal.emptyState: No team members with custom rates for this service

popover.helperText: In here you can customize the price and duration specifically for {{locationName}}.

description.controlServices: Manage service availability and customize pricing or duration specifically for this location.

sheet.title: Select Services for {{locationName}}
sheet.subtitle: Select which services customers can book at this location

emptyState.title: No services assigned to this location yet
emptyState.description: Select services to make them available at this location.

noServicesCreated.title: No services created yet
noServicesCreated.description: Create your first service to get started. Once created, you can assign it to this location.

description.controlBundles: Manage bundle availability at this location. Bundles cannot be customized per location.

sheet.title: Select Bundles for {{locationName}}
sheet.subtitle: Select which bundles customers can book at this location

emptyState.title: No bundles assigned to this location yet
emptyState.description: Select bundles to make them available at this location.

noBundlesCreated.title: No bundles created yet
noBundlesCreated.description: Create your first bundle to get started. Once created, you can assign it to this location.

emptyState.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search to find what you're looking for.

description.helperText: Enable the staff members who work at this location. You can optionally customize services and pricing for specific employees.
description.disabledHelperText: Add services to this location before assigning team members.

bookingMode.title: Allow customers to select specific staff members
bookingMode.descriptionOff: Customers will book the location directly. Jobs are assigned automatically based on the staff you enable below.
bookingMode.descriptionOn: Customers can now choose their preferred specialist. You can customize services and pricing for each team member below.

simpleMode.helperText: Toggle on the staff members who work at this location. Their schedules will be used to calculate the location's total booking capacity.

emptyState.title: No team members assigned
emptyState.description: Assign team members to this location to manage their services.
emptyState.noMatchingMembers: No team members match your search.
emptyState.noMembersWithOverrides: No team members have custom overrides.
emptyState.noTeamMembersInBusinessDescription: Add team members to your business first to assign them to locations.
emptyState.noServicesRequiredDescription: You need to add services to this location before you can assign team members.

manageTeamMemberDrawer.title: Manage Services for {{name}}
manageTeamMemberDrawer.titleSubtitle: Enable services and set custom rates for this team member.
manageTeamMemberDrawer.description: Configure services and pricing for this team member at this location.

info.basePrices: Base prices come from location service settings.

manageTeamMemberDrawer.disabledMessage: Enable this service to set custom pricing.

emptyState.noServices: No services available at this location.
emptyState.noServicesDescription: No services available at this location.
emptyState.noEnabled: No services enabled for this member.

toasts.teamMemberAssigned: {{memberName}} has been assigned to this location
toasts.teamMemberRemoved: {{memberName}} has been removed from this location
toasts.teamMemberAssignFailed: Failed to assign {{memberName}} to this location
toasts.teamMemberRemoveFailed: Failed to remove {{memberName}} from this location
